Blog.post: I managed to wake up even though i slept like 3 last night... So i went to school, knowing jolly well that i would be decapitated from the very first period... firstly i did not bring my school badge, next, i did not do my h/w, and, i did not bring my PE attire... Totally Screwed...crap BUT, i did not arrive to school late, did not get punished for improper attire, or yellow forms for late h/w's... Sadly, i had to serve my sentence for being late, way back in March...two hours of detention (sleeping) To summarize today, i feel good~
hmm.. . . . .. . .. I've juz started my h/w, so only a few detention...
ok 5 dayz left, and i'm gonna start my homework tommorow...
Owww... the holiday so close coming to an end... NoOOooOoOo!! crap can't help it can I? Ok my objective is to complete 6 subjects of homework...xiao one day one? no prob!!

School's borring... Mr. Lai: I'm goona show you sumthing today...blah blah Me*squeaky high voice*:yey! show us sumthing! then kenna scolded... My friend and i came up with this character sketch ... I am... deprived, sadistic, Irresponsible, Bastard, spastic vulgar, loser, communist*??*, caffeine deprived, slack, d***face, hairy...... Interesting eh?

heh... can't stop sleeping in school... teachers in and out... in one ear out the other one... close an eye, fold my hands... touchdown...my head's on my hand...zzZZ ...zzZZ Ring!! next lesson... confusion all over, my record unbeatable look out the window... the golden sunlight splashing on the tree... it's tiny green leaves.... ahhh~ next destination: la la land...

HAHA... renaissance was a succes...yes? yes... bcoz of me!! all thx to me... for screwing up i did my best, but how much can u screw up with a tambourine? DM: the performance was freakin nice!! SL:I have two good news. One... Im damn happy... Two Im damn happy... SL:If you do well to night, I give you one Kit-Kat, If you do damn good, i give you ywo Kit-Kat, If you do a wonderful job, i give you two Kit-Kat and one trunky, if you do a super good job...... PTE:Good job~ SGT:Good Job... The gal who walked past me(when i was at attention):Cannot mve ah? pathetic... wad do i do?? just a smile~ then after the concert... Dm got bl***y angry, the canvs or wadeva was torn, costs 16k then sec1 recuits got blamed for it...surely next parade RO gonna pump us like ****. since the renaissance is over, time for a B R E A K !!

Question: Am i even fit to be a chairman? heh... firstly, i hold the record for sleeping in the class most secondly, i hold the record for coming to the latest thirdly, i hold the record for coming to school late for the most amount of time forthly, only 50% of my h/w's are done on time fifthly, i have been in detention clss the most there's more... So~ Being a chairman isn't 'that' hard... I'm unique tts all. *I'm serious* haha hmmm... lately i find myself REAL sleepy in class, in bus, even in assembly... tuition started a few weeks ago... and i dun wanna tok about it...
why is everything so pointless?
hmm... tomorrow, sunday, there's this CIP s***... Got project left... chinese essay... math file check... english file oso... literature h/w... (-.-')

today i managed to go to lala land during bio period, almost got my drumsticks confiscated during math, did not bring a calculator for the SPA... reflection: the math teacher sux, my sec2 seniors suk, my practical sucked...
hmmm wad did i learn today? all i can remember is that i had hydroponics thingy and that next month I'm gonna take over the world market :) hehe crap...
ok... my chinese is going down... i dun noe wad the bio teacher is teaching... i hate my eng teacher... sch rox

Today... the presentation goes... all the slacking pays off... Our poster was pretty much one of the best... hmmm... Chris was was absent and he got 0/6 for individual.... sigh~ yesterday, i was all alone doing poster till 2 am... listening to Maroon5~ shiok! Total of 5hours spent on poster... - Now my chinc is in trouble... failed chinc and now need to do retest or sumthing... tmr got history test... Hist. teacher was pissed coz the guyz who took the test earlier on, told the whole level the Ans' - Military band this friday... got annual parade ...muz go in concert attire...*for wad only!*

Mom is gone... I'm alone... life goes on... cook, wash, clean, crap... hmm... memories of the mid-night cycling drift past me whenever i talk to my friends, and i feel like i'm speeding forward when i lie to sleep...addiction?
Am I crazy? Or is it the world?

Millitary Band...Percusion... Best slackin CCA!! uhh but im in trouble now, coz they make me dance/entertain the audience for the upcoming crap... NooOOoOooo!!! Ok I'm gonna be alone at home again w/ me bro next monday... my mom going to Cambodia next monday, so my house is open for any late-nite...... Haha!! juz jokin
ok somebody help me out here... it took me the whole day to edit this blog and well... it was stupid...hmm... so somebody Help me!!! hmmm... wad to do?
From the start of the morning i've been playing guitar all along, and now i got my finger cut...*peep* geez... bored at home w\ H/Ws...
hmm...its 9:06pm Today i came back from church camp at around 10:00am? and basically i slept the whole day... so... argh... hungry....
came back from nite-hike... dunno where but not bad... shu hui blan-ja me food... take 67 come back... gonna sleep...now
this is about my 5629th day on earth... 135072+ hours...

:::A lil thing called lurv::: ~got this sumwhere of the web~ are u in luv?... Message: When you are together with that special someone, you pretend to ignore that person. But when that special someone is not around, you might look around to find them. At that moment, you are in love. Although there is someone else who always makes you laugh, your eyes and attention might go only to that special someone. Then, you are in love. Although that special someone was supposed to have called you long back, to let you know of their safe arrival, your phone is quiet. You are desperately waiting for the call! At that moment, you are in love. If you are much more excited for one short e-mail from that special someone than other many long e-mails, you are in love. When you find yourself as one who cannot erase all the messages in your answering machine because of one message from thatspecial someone, you are in love. When you get a couple of free movie tickets, you would not hesitate to think of that special someone. Then, you are in love. You keep telling yourself, "that special someone is just a friend", but you realize that you can not avoid that person's special attraction. At that moment, you are in love. While you are reading this page, if someone appears in your mind, then u are in love with that person.

ARGH!! got flu... stupid flu stupid flu stupid flu stupid flu stupid flu stupid flu sneeze so much... my nose's gonna tear soon sigh~ im gonna change again... to a gd guai boy no more F' word... or shit.... or or s-hol... hmmm...... Juz called danial's mom... teach him math... monday 3pm... not bad not bad not bad at all... juz tt...Noooooooooooooooooo!! Why!! Why!! hm... still... not bad Depression? nah~ This is Life!! thump!! *look down*....'is tt my nose?'

I am EXTREMELY deceptive... shit... ONLY those who have known me for 5years + will know the crazy personality of mine... But now tt i have changed again... Who will know me...Who am I?? bah... load of s***s Dun like me, **** off CAn't change me now...

hm... is this called depression?... ****! The new me... to be myself... Do i need to please other...? to hell with it!! Im living my life now... Don't take offence plz, if an F-word or wadeva slips out of my mouth.... Im adjusting to the new me...

I admit I'm different now.... More open ... at least a bit more than before More full of crap more confident less responsible less physically active less childish? more mature...somehow in someways more impulsive less respectful less thrifty more judgmental less disciplined more...... less.....

I'm juz one of the million, You're one in a million...
Today... was so full of crap... band practice was s***... and tomorrow we're having our concert, PERFECT isn't it? anywayz...I GiVe Up! ~EnD Of sTOry~ full stop.

...sian~ all day at home... anyway a new resolution... no more swearing :) and sleeping before 1 a.m. (: yesterday i miss the chalet..............wah~ wah~ BUT still i went for drums... okey okey ah... the teacher like wad only, crap... so today watch smallville and sleep...zzZZ

uhh... ok today oso i got up late then go do CIP at Bishan park... ok... i goes like this 7:45-i wake to see the time , 'shit! im late... heck ah miss one CIP only..." sleep again 7:48-matthew calls... pisses me off...i piss him off, i go back to sleep 7:55-somebody calls cant remember...hang up, go to sleep 8:00-jian fei calls he say:'hey, come ah, even late u come now can get two hour CIP....' 8:15-take taxi and go to park w/ bro 9:00-reach Bishan Park, but cannot find anybody... (i was walking to the other side of the park when and old man riding a bicycle comes up to me and asks how to pronouce my school name, 'St. Joseph's ...Institution" then he goes like "st. yeozus ah? gd gd at least you can go in... young man study hard..." and he goes off... and i was like 'wtf mate' 9:30-reach the 'place', hang around 9:40- play soccer 10:15-take bus ?136? go ang mo kio MRT then go home then go church...slept half-way... hmmm...concert in 5 dayz literature test this week...
--- Immobilized by the thought of you Paralyzed by the sight of you Hypnotized by the words you say Not true but I believe anyway -Shiver-Maroon5 ---

hmm... sch concert in two weeks time...and ... i got nothing to do this weekend till monday...

juz a yr ago... my heart was wide as the ocean, deep as the sea....*crap* many mermaids lived in it... it was calm... peaceful... grab a fish n tt's yur dinner then i became 15...*puberty most likely* the ocean started to toss n turn, gigantic waves... powerful winds... confusion all over... a search for something... .... slowly the water dried up, and there appeared a island there i put 4 seasons... juz to have the beautiful autumn... men lived in it... men like Confidence and Defiance was born... while mermaids like Patience n Order grew old.. then i come into the picture... I search for who I am... __________________________________________________ another master-piece crap...

Thinking about this for quite some time... HOME There's a vast piece of land, covered with fresh green grass... It's not humid, it's not wet... 4 seasons...long autumns and short winters... Somewhere in the middle of it is a road... Along this road are houses... 20? 30? they are all 2nd storey houses... not 1 or 3 they are of the most beautiful design... yet so simple many with picket fence and some with swimming pool under the clear sky with a few patches of clouds and your standing in the middle of the road... looking past the houses... under the lamp light... looking at the city juz a few mlies any... the crystal clear high-rise walls reflecting the sunset... then you hear a bicycle ring... you turn around to see your son cycling towards you... -------------------------------------------------------- Aww crap...
